Read the Geographic Attributes File

Source: R/geo_suite.R
get_geographic_attributes.Rd

Reads the Geographies Attributes File for the given census year. The table contains the information on how all the geographic levels are related for each area, and population, dwelling and household counts. A reference guide is available at https://www150.statcan.gc.ca/n1/en/catalogue/92-151-G2021001

get_geographic_attributes(census_year = "2016", refresh = FALSE)

Arguments

census_year

census year to get the data for, right now only 2006, 2011 and 2016 are supported

refresh

(logical) refresh the cache if true

Value

tibble with the relationship data

Examples

# list add the cached census data
get_geographic_attributes("2016")
#> # A tibble: 489,905 × 48
#>    `DBuid/IDidu` `DBpop2016/IDpop2016` `DBtdwell2016/IDtlog… `DBurdwell2016/IDr…
